text: Meet Rudra Nagalia, a dedicated MHA student on a mission to revolutionize healthcare technology! 💻💡 With a passion for improving healthcare outcomes, he's leveraging his background in product development and entrepreneurship to make a difference. 💼👨‍💻 Check out the latest #InnovateForGood feature to learn more about Rudra's journey and how he's using technology to address mental health challenges. 🌟🌱
